question_text: Which of the following are key features of a layer 3 switch? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Provides routing and switching in one device
Uses a routing table to forward packets
Always replaces the router in a network
Forwards traffic based on MAC address at layer 2
correct_answer: Provides routing and switching in one device
Uses a routing table to forward packets
Forwards traffic based on MAC address at layer 2
explanation: Layer 3 switches can route between subnets, switch frames at layer 2, and provide both functions in one unit.
